user_data.target_needs: The main need I wanted to fulfill was finding comfortable and well-fitting underwear that would provide support and prevent any discomfort throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for comfortable underwear that would provide a good fit without being restrictive. The product's soft material and specially constructed pouch were key features that appealed to me, as I prioritize comfort in my daily wear. The positive reviews and the high rating also influenced my decision, as they indicated a reliable product.

I needed a comfortable option that would prevent ride-up and provide good support. The product's design features, such as the secure fit leg and non-binding waistband, were important to me. I also appreciated the positive feedback from other users, which reassured me about the quality and comfort of the boxer briefs.

I was searching for soft and comfortable underwear that would not ride up. The product's description highlighted its comfort and support features, which were appealing. However, I had some concerns about the length and the absence of a front flap, which made me slightly hesitant.

I was looking for cooling underwear that would keep me comfortable throughout the day. However, my experience was disappointing as the product shrank significantly after washing, which affected my overall satisfaction. This negative experience led me to prefer another brand that I had previously purchased.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that are comfortable, well-fitting, and made from high-quality materials. I value versatility in my wardrobe, as I enjoy pieces that can transition from workouts to casual outings. Features like moisture-wicking capabilities, softness, and durability are important to me, as I appreciate items that maintain their quality after multiple washes. I also tend to favor brands that offer consistent sizing and thoughtful design details, such as pockets in leggings or breathable fabrics in underwear. On the other hand, I dislike items that fit poorly, especially if they are too tight or too loose in key areas. I am particularly sensitive to issues like pilling, shrinking, or any discomfort caused by seams or zippers. Overall, I seek a balance of style, comfort, and practicality in my clothing choices.

conversation.content: I want to find comfortable and well-fitting underwear that provides support and prevents any discomfort throughout the day. within my expected price range: [15.53, 27.59]
What specific style of underwear do you prefer, such as briefs, boxers, trunks, or another type?
I prefer boxer briefs for my underwear. They offer a good balance between support and comfort, which aligns with my needs.
What material do you prefer for your boxer briefs to ensure both comfort and support?

I prefer boxer briefs made from soft and breathable materials like modal or a cotton blend. These fabrics usually provide a good combination of comfort and support, which is essential for me. What options do you have in this category?

Here are some items that you might like: 
Item No.1 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxer Briefs, Cotton Stretch Moisture-Wicking Underwear, 6-Pack> / Item ID: B0C6JDX8V5 / Price: $24.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ["This men's boxer briefs multipack is made from soft and breathable stretch cotton that moves with you, thanks to our Cool Comfort® fabric. Our experts designed them with a Comfort Flex® waistband that flexes and moves with you. Each pair of boxer brief underwear has a no-ride-up design, so they'll stay put no matter what your day holds. Plus, you can throw them right in the washer when they need a quick refresh. And our favorite feature part of all? These men's black boxer brief underwear sets have different waistband colors and also come in multiple size options, from Small to extended sizes like 3XL, so you can choose the one that works best for you."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Men's Boxers 5-Pack, Cotton Knit Comfortable Boxer Underwear, Moisture-Wicking Cotton Boxers Multipack> / Item ID: B09J24M56M / Price: $20.0 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxers'] / Description: ["Think of everything you love about your softest tee and imagine how that would feel in ultra-comfortable cotton knit boxers. Here they are from Hanes® with comfort in every detail. Soft and breathable, these basic knit boxers are made from Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. These cotton boxers enhance comfort further with the ComfortFlex® stretch logo waistband that moves with you and keeps its shape wash after wash without pinching or binding. Another detail of comfort designed into Hanes® T-shirt-soft knit underwear is the tagless styling which means no annoying tag to bunch up or itch. You'll also appreciate the button fly that stays smooth and the convenience of a 5-pack for stock-up ease."] 
Item No.3 : Item Title: <ZLYC Mens Long Leg Cotton Boxer Briefs Fit Underwear, 3/4 Pack> / Item ID: B079L3M5NM / Price: $22.99 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Men', 'Clothing', 'Underwear', 'Boxer Briefs'] / Description: ['This mens boxer briefs will keep you comfortable all day long. Made of 95% premium combed cotton, comfy, breathable, softer and stronger than standard cotton. It has wide elastic waistband that offers a comfortable fit in every situation. Tag free and no ride ups are always a must. Plus, the contour pouch gives your stuff the support it needs and cosy room. Order now and enjoy the comfort of this classic!', 'Material', ': 95% Cotton and 5% Elastan', 'Size', ': Tag M=32-34 Inches Tag L=36-38 Inches Tag XL=40-42 Inches', 'Washing Instruction', ': 1. Machine wash warm with like colors2. Use only non-chlorine bleach when needed.3. Tumble dry medium.4. Cool iron if needed.', 'Satisfaction Guarantee', ': If any problem, please feel free to contact us and we will work hard towards your 100% satisfaction (new replacements or refund)']
